description: The Norman Gunston show volume two, features highlights from the television series "The Norman Gunston show", aired in 1993. Comedian Garry McDonald appears in character as Norman Gunston, a guileless interviewer and performer with a variety/entertainment show. Interviewees on this disc include: Shirley MacLaine, Paul Mercurio, Elvis impersonators, Julian Clary, Linda Gray, Brian Austin Greene, Rod Steiger, and Sally Struthers. Also features one song from music groups Sonia Dada and The Dukes as well as Gunston's musical rendition of "Achy breaky heart".
